Default._comment: Don't use whitelist and blacklist at the same time, as whitelist will overwrite blacklist if used
Default.CommandWhitelist: id help count countall shortcuts sleep stopwatch

Creator._comment: Don't use whitelist and blacklist at the same time, as whitelist will overwrite blacklist if used
Creator.CommandWhitelist: addgame count countall crchannel crpchannel crvchannel crtempchannel crpvchannel dump edbitrate edchannel edlimit edname edtopic edvchannel edvname edvtopic help id shortcuts sleep stopwatch

Maker._comment: Don't use whitelist and blacklist at the same time, as whitelist will overwrite blacklist if used
Maker.CommandBlacklist: blacklist listids setnick setname setavatar restart shutdown perms
